item.title: Learning Go Programming - Golang Tutorial for Beginners
item.description: Variable declaration var foo int declare and initialise later; useful for var foo int = 42 useful when compiler might guess the variable type wrong foo := 42 declare and initialise shorthand. let compiler decide type variables cannot be redeclared but can be assigned new values all variables must be used Visibility lowercase first letter for package scope; variable is available and is accessible to all source files that available in that package

item.title: Learning Golang - From Zero to Hero
